text: @BBCBreaking Sad, but not surprised. I’ve been very disappointed with @BootsUK Covid-19 response. Struggled to keep stores stocked & bizarrely withdrew most of the everyday items you’d buy from their online shop. Drove me to Amazon, their competitors or the manufacturers, often with free P&P.
